error.signature: Error creating: pods is forbidden: error looking up service account: serviceaccount not found
error.regex: serviceaccount.*not found|service account.*does not exist|looking up service account

verdict.summary: Pod references a ServiceAccount that doesn't exist in the namespace. Pods can't be created until the ServiceAccount is created.

dead_ends.action: Remove the serviceAccountName field to use default
dead_ends.why_fails: May break RBAC-dependent workloads that need specific permissions

dead_ends.action: Create the ServiceAccount in a different namespace
dead_ends.why_fails: ServiceAccounts are namespace-scoped â€” must be in the same namespace as the pod

workarounds.action: Create the missing ServiceAccount in the correct namespace
Verify the pod spec references the correct ServiceAccount name and namespace
workarounds.how: kubectl get serviceaccounts -n <namespace> to list available service accounts

leads_to.condition: when ServiceAccount exists but lacks required RBAC permissions

preceded_by.condition: when namespace was recreated but ServiceAccounts weren't recreated

frequently_confused_with.distinction: ServiceAccount not found means the account itself is missing, while Secret not found means a referenced secret doesn't exist
